file_content.text: Sith, I'm on death's door. My name is Injaye. Baras's spy. Imbedded among the Jedi for over a decade.
I should have revealed myself to you. Never imagined you could defeat us all. My fatal mistake.
I was here to kill you. If you'd revealed yourself, I would have struck you down anyway.
It wouldn't have mattered.
Then I am a complete fool.
You were to deliver the Jedi to their deaths. That is achieved. Die at peace.
Your mission was successful.
You are kind.
You and Baras rely on tricks and hide behind disguises. It's pathetic.
You die a coward's death.
So cold.
I die knowing that I served the Voice of the Emperor....
Your invasion ends here, Sith. You are severely outnumbered
Darth Baras's spy--identify yourself so you don't die with these Jedi.
One of you is Sith.
Are you suggesting that one of us is an Imperial?
A pathetic trick. She's in over her head and makes a desperate play to destabilize us.
A pathetic trick. He's in over his head and makes a desperate play to destabilize us.
Be reasonable, Sith. You can't take us all.
Final warning, my fellow Sith. Step forward, or die with these prattling nuisances.
Last chance, spy.
Hold. I must speak.
If you knew me, you wouldn't wonder if I can defeat you.
I am more than capable.
I am called the Emperor's Wrath.
I was chosen by the Emperor.
I know this Sith. Gentleman, this is Darth Baras's former apprentice, who has survived his old master's best efforts to destroy him.
You are becoming a legend among us, my friend. I am thankful you've given me a chance to save myself.
Master Injaye, you?
All these years, right under your nose.
I was to lead you to your deaths today. Instead, I'll watch my new friend destroy you.
You're the one I'm here to destroy.
Surprise. [Kill Injaye]
I just wanted to be sure you were among these Jedi. Now you die along with them.
You're all enemies. [Attack]
We have one last common purpose, Injaye. Fight!
Your work for Baras is over, Injaye. I'm going to let these Jedi take you into custody.
You are their prisoner now.
What? Don't be a fool!
The tides have turned, Injaye.
We were on a suicide mission. We'd be walking to our deaths if not for you.
Think before you act, Jedi. There's something you need to know.
Relax. I'm here to help.
One of you is a Sith spy, leading you into a death trap. I'm here to take him out.
What? That's preposterous.
Sith are master manipulators. We won't fall for your tricks.
Give me one good reason why we should believe you.
My compatriot was once Nomen Karr's Padawan. You may know of her special powers.
Do you know Jaesa Willsaam?
We know of Jaesa Willsaam.
She supposedly has the ability to see the true nature of any being.
One of you has a secret that Jaesa will expose now.
That should scare one of you.
I assure you, her gifts are real.
Don't doubt it.
I need to know something, and she's going to figure it out for me.
I don't care if you believe.
Jaesa, use your power on the Jedi.
Yes, my master....
My pleasure, master....
Are we really going to sit here while this Sith mocks us?
Patience, Master Joce. I'm interested to see what she comes up with.
I sense rigidity and putrid calm, earnestness and logic and... wait! This one is filled with deceit, and now rage blossoms. She is the Sith spy!
They are all pure, earnest, unwavering, unemotional, except... her! I sense deceit and now growing rage. She is the Sith spy!
Master Injaye?
I sense truth. I feel a shift in her. Have we been blind to it all this time?
Stupid fool. I would have led these Jedi to their deaths and struck a great victory for the Empire.
I oppose everything Baras does, and I'll kill everyone aligned with him.
For Darth Baras.
How fortunate.
When Baras betrayed me, he gave the Republic a new champion.
I don't care about the Empire.
And we are very grateful for that. Our secret ally.
Now, you should leave before we must explain your presence.
Let me save you the trouble.
You're so naive. [Attack.]
Who says they'll survive this encounter?
I may strike that victory.
Now listen, Sith, you've exposed your spy. Be smart and walk away.
Not before I do this.
Not yet. [Kill Injaye]
Aaaaah!
You are a barbarian.
Steady, Master Joce. This Sith saved us from a suicide mission.
This way, I get to kill you.
I am death. [Attack]
The Sith attacks! Use whatever force is necessary!
Take this spy into custody, Jedi.
Neutralize Injaye.
Yes. She will be imprisoned for her crimes.
We were on a suicide mission. We'd be walking into death if not for you.
Proceed with your work. Without Baras's spy, there is no danger.
[Lie] Your quest is safe now.
Ah, I see.
So we're proceeding as planned, Master Rubatin?
That's right. We'll ship Injaye off to her new high-security home, then resume the mission.
That's right. Gear up, our mission awaits.
Glad I could help.
You're welcome.
You are a great asset to us. Be well, friend.
Be sure she never sees the light of day again. Or else.
If she escapes, you'll pay.
She shall be securely locked away.
It has been an education, Sith. Perhaps we'll meet again.
I'll walk away over your steaming corpses.
First, you all die. [Attack]
Fight with us, Injaye! We are aligned one last time!
Search your feelings. You know I speak the truth.
Don't live in denial.
Nice try, Sith.
You're wrong. This team has been together for years.
This troubles my senses. Something rings true.
No, Master Rubatin, we must not fall for Sith tricks. Attack!
It's your funeral if you don't.
Because you want to live?
I'd say that constitutes a threat.
It's our duty to neutralize you, Sith.
My fellows, use whatever force is necessary to bring the Sith down.
I don't have time to convince you. When I kill you all, I'll take out the spy, too.
Oh well, I tried. [Attack.]
I don't know which of you is my target, so I'm going to have to kill you all.
One of you must die. [Attack]
You are bold and foolish. Attack the Sith!
Surprise. [Kill Injaye]
